intro_only_event_multi_swsh_advertise_2/: Thank you so much for helping me train, Bruno!

Of course! Through battle and rigorous training,
there is no limit to how strong Trainers and
Pokémon can become!
Yeah! I’ll make sure to keep training hard!

Oh, speaking of which, I overheard somebody
talking around here that there’s a Pokémon battle
dojo on the Isle of Armor in the Galar region.

Really? I didn’t know such a thing existed
in Galar.

Every region has its own training practices.
I wonder what sort of training they do in Galar...

Galar is said to be abundant with nature. Perhaps
they use the environment to their advantage while
they train.
I’d love the chance to train in Galar someday!
Don’t let your dreams be dreams, Maylene.

Continue training and battling, and you’ll arrive
in Galar soon enough.
Thank you, Bruno.

Yeah! I’m gonna keep right on training, then!
Look out, Galar—here I come!
So, I overheard some people talking...

Apparently there’s a Trainer named Mustard
on the Isle of Armor in the Galar region.

Rumor has it he held the title of Champion for
18 years straight.

Is that right? Well, now you have this Champion’s
attention. For 18 years, huh...

He must be incredibly strong if he was able to
remain Champion for that long.

I heard that he now spends his days training
students at his Pokémon battle dojo.

I also heard that he even trained Leon, the current
Champion of Galar. If that’s the case, he must be
an excellent teacher.

We have our work cut out for us if we want to
live up to that legacy, don’t we?

I hope he’s open to challengers if we ever get
the chance to visit Galar.

How about a double battle? You and me against
Mustard and Leon. How does that sound?

Sounds good. Until then, we need to make sure
we’re at our best.

So, ya know how we’re both Poison-type
Gym Leaders?

Well, I heard there’s this really strong Poison-type
Trainer at a dojo on the Isle of Armor in Galar.
Ever heard of it? And get this—she’s a girl, too!

Oh, really? It’s nice to know that there’s another
girl out there who likes Poison types.

I wonder what her training was like. My father’s
training worked me to the bone...
We must train even harder, then!

Yeah! Then we can battle her and see how good
she really is!

There are so many strategies that Poison types
excel in. I wonder what kinds of moves she uses...

I’m getting excited just talking about it! One of
these days, we should go challenge that dojo!

Music to my ears! I’ll roll up to that Trainer with
an official letter of challenge, then rock her with
my poison and really knock some sense outta her!

Not before I show her the essence of a
ninja’s moves!

I recently learned about a Pokémon that lives
in the Galar region!
It’s called Kubfu. Do you guys know about it?

Apparently it’s super dedicated to training and
nothing else.

Doesn’t that kinda sound like you guys?
Omigosh! If either one of you partnered up
with it, you’d make a perfect pair!

Heh heh! You know me—I’m always aiming for
the top!

I bet if you and Kubfu were partners, Red, you
two would go off and train for days, huh?
You both look like you’re itching to train again.
Well then, what are we waiting for?!

Guilty as charged. Hearing you talk about Kubfu
got me all worked up!
Same goes for you, too, huh, Red?
Great! Then let’s battle!

We gotta keep training, too, so we don’t lose to
that Kubfu when the time comes!
